idea:
At present, there is no omni-present brand for Chinese food which provides excellent quality food wherein consumers have a reliable choice to make from for the Chinese cuisine.

Hence, the Concnetus Foods Pvt Ltd (Concnetus) has developed a business model which caters to the target audience with gourmet meals in Chinese Cuisines (mainly) and other multi-cuisine specialty food at affordable prices and as per their convenience of time and location. Concnetus is on path to develop consumer brands in Chinese & Indian cuisine space.

This model will cater to the food requirements of the young & upwardly mobile urbane youth segment which is a frequent consumer of such food delicacies on various occasions of personal, family & official occasions. The Company works on its 3 core pillars of philosophy .i.e. Health, Hygiene & Happiness to govern its business.

On account of the proper findings on supply side gaps, Concentus Food Pvt. Ltd. will be benefited with their unique innovative model of Lower CAPEX & OPEX leading to improved profitability as the model is mainly planned on ‘utilising the unutilized supply side infrastructure’.

Unique Innovative Business Model: Supply side capacity creation through capacity utilization of the existing restaurants:

In addition to the existing own Central Kitchen infrastructure, Concentus aims to create a very lean, low CAPEX / OPEX intensive supply chain for food delivery through effective capacity utilization by partnering with the existing restaurant, kitchen, hotel owners where capacity is fully not utilized of their kitchen. Concentus has developed technology which minimize wastages and increase efficiencies in production. Also, they have done product innovation where any lower scale labor can be used in production. This is significantly helping to upgrading income of underprivilege and lower strata of society and big employment booster.

• The company plans to operate 45-50 kitchens over next 12-24 months in order to serve consumers across the Greater Mumbai area.

• In the 2nd phase of operations, company aims to expand in other cities like Delhi NCR, Pune, Hyderabad & Bangalore.
name: Concentus Foods Private Limited
